column5: Was planning on fishing the Saugeen tomorrow but the rain put us off, so off Smallie fishing a local lake on Sunday with a few buddies, hopefully the Pigs are eating Richard
Get em now while you still can. Good luck on Sunday. Im gonna try for some as well.

They are definitly slowing down around here. Water temps are down to about 48 degrees. The bite has slowed down considerably in the last week. Still, if the weather breaks I will head out looking for the big ones.
Funny. I had plans to fish smallmouth on Erie tomorrow but because of the rain will likely be fishing the Saugeen for steelhead. LOL!
MSP Good luck to  you as well SINGINGDOG the temp was 47 to 48 last week for my report & every one came on tubes in 7 to 10 fow SOLOPADDLER Best of luck either way Post  a report Guys Thanx Richard
